course_description:
Topic: Leading with Emotional Intelligence
The course is intended to focus on the leadership demands that students will likely face upon re-entry into managerial roles within corporations, mid-sized firms, professional services firms or large, public sector organizations This course concentrates on developing skills as both a leader and as a follower.  The course is designed to enhance self-awareness and how to bring out the leadership potential in those around you.
